scripts.now-build: yarn build-report && yarn copy-report && yarn build && mv docs/.vuepress/dist public
scripts.build: yarn build-web-report && yarn copy-web-report && yarn docs:build
scripts.build-report: cd reacnetgenerator/static/webpack && yarn && yarn start && cd ../../../
scripts.build-web-report: cd reacnetgenerator/static/webpack && yarn && REACNETGENERATOR_BUILDWEB=1 yarn start && cd ../../../
scripts.copy-web-report: mv reacnetgenerator/static/webpack/bundle.html docs/.vuepress/public/report.html && mv reacnetgenerator/static/webpack/bundle.js reacnetgenerator/static/webpack/bundle.css docs/.vuepress/public/ && cp reacnetgenerator/static/webpack/fire.png docs/.vuepress/public/
